gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 116, Trail Blazers 103
gameRecap.excerpt: The Clippers defeated the Blazers, 116-103, as they moved to 43-25 on the year. Paul George totaled 27 points, his fourth straight game with 25 or more, along with six rebounds, and four assists as Kawhi Leonard (24 points) and James Harden (19 points, 14 assists) added 43 points. Scoot Henderson led Portland with 18 points and five assists in the loss while Kris Murray added a career-high with 17 points. Portland moves to 19-50 with the loss.
